DESCRIPTION: A USER FRIENDLY QUERY BOT WHICH PROMTS USER TO ENTER NAME AND OTHER REQUIRED DETAILS
A BMI CALCULATOR WHICH GET IT'S VALUE FROM THE QUERY BOT AND PROCESS AND CATEGORISE USER INTO ONE OUT OF THE FIVE BODY WEIGHT STATUS
A WORKPLAN CHART ACCORDING TO THE WEIGHT STATUS WITH LIVE COMMAND, LIVE TIMER, WITH AN OPTION TO SKIP AND CONTINUE
